text: Florina is a city in Greece. Florina may also refer to: * Florina (regional unit), an administrative unit in Greece * Florina (name), a female Romanian given name * Florina (planet), a planet in Isaac Asimov's Foundation universe * Florina (apple), an apple cultivar * Florina, a character from the video game Fire Emblem : Rekka no Ken on Game Boy Advance == See also == * Florinas, a city in Sardinia, Italy sv:Florina
title: Florina (disambiguation)
